localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Rysolv provides a platform for users to share issues, contribute to open source, and get paid for their work. 💸 Anyone can create an issue or contribute towards a bounty. Whoever submits a solution closing out the issue earns the bounty.
blogPost.body: Rysolv provides a platform for users to share issues, contribute to open source, and get paid for their work. 💸 Anyone can create an issue or contribute towards a bounty. Whoever submits a solution closing out the issue earns the bounty.
blogPost.title: rysolv - Fix open source issues, get paid
blogPost.author: Tyler Maran

localize.description: Rysolv 为用户提供了一个分享问题、为开源做贡献并获得报酬的平台。💸任何人都可以创建一个问题或为赏金做出贡献。谁提交了结束问题的解决方案，谁就能获得赏金。
localize.tagline: 修复开源问题，获得报酬

localize.description: Rysolv 爲用戶提供了一個分享問題、爲開源做貢獻並獲得報酬的平臺。💸任何人都可以創建一個問題或爲賞金做出貢獻。誰提交了結束問題的解決方案，誰就能獲得賞金。
localize.tagline: 修復開源問題，獲得報酬

previous.excerpt: Been working on an icon set off and on over the last year, and I am finally releasing V1 today! What You'll Get: • Sketch File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights • Figma File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights
previous.title: Friendly Line Icon Set - 150+ meticulously crafted line icons

localize.description: 在过去的一年里，我一直在断断续续地研究一个图标集，今天我终于发布了V1! 你会得到什么。- 草图文件 - 150多个细线型、标准型和薄型的图标 - Figma文件 - 150多个细线型、标准型和薄型的图标。
在過去的一年裏，我一直在斷斷續續地研究一個圖標集，今天我終於發佈了V1! 你會得到什麼。- 草圖文件 - 150多個細線型、標準型和薄型的圖標 - Figma文件 - 150多個細線型、標準型和薄型的圖標。

next.excerpt: Power People Platform is a free design library of 3D avatars. Made with love ❤️ for more fun and color in your work. They are perfect for your mockups, presentations, storyboards or any other creative project you are working on. Available as Photoshop files.
next.title: Power People Platform - Free illustration library of 3D avatars - Made with love ❤️

localize.description: 动力人平台是一款免费的3D头像设计库。用爱制造❤️为你的工作带来更多乐趣和色彩。它们非常适合您的模拟图，演示文稿，故事板或您正在进行的任何其他创意项目。可作为Photoshop文件。
localize.tagline: 免费的3D头像插画库--用爱做的❤️

localize.description: 動力人平臺是一款免費的3D頭像設計庫。用愛製造❤️爲你的工作帶來更多樂趣和色彩。它們非常適合您的模擬圖，演示文稿，故事板或您正在進行的任何其他創意項目。可作爲Photoshop文件。
localize.tagline: 免費的3D頭像插畫庫--用愛做的❤️
